comment.author: 19132792@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for Manly, part of Sydney, those beaches, that walk, and we'd love to have this added to the group! It would be a companion to a modern photo of the college.

comment.author: 40259550@N05
comment._content: It is a beautiful photo. This is now the campus of the International College of Management, Sydney. A stunning place to live and study!

comment.author: 55550966@N04
comment._content: St Patricks College Manly began construction in June 1885 and was completed about 3 years later, opening on 26 January,1889. Judging by the stage of construction in this image, the photograph must have been taken in 1887-1888

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Here's a pic which appeared in the Australian Town & Country Journal in November 1893 - nla.gov.au/nla.news-article63672418
